original_text: This is what the Almighty Lord says to Tyre: All the people who live on the coast of the sea will hear the news. When they know that you have fallen to the ground, they will shake with fear. They will hear the loud cries of your people when they die in the battle.
korean_text: 주 여호와께서 이같이 두로에 대하여 말씀하시되 네가 엎드러지는 소리에 모든 섬이 진동하지 아니하겠느냐 곧 너희 가운데에 상한 자가 부르짖으며 죽임을 당할 때에라

sentences.original_text: This is what the Almighty Lord says to Tyre:
sentences.korean_translation: 이것이 전능하신 주께서 두로에게 말씀하시는 것이니라:

sentences.original_text: All the people who live on the coast of the sea
When they know that you have fallen to the ground,
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 네가 땅에 쓰러졌음을 알 때에,

sentences.original_text: They will hear the loud cries of your people
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 네 백성의 큰 부르짖음을 들을 것이고

sentences.original_text: when they die in the battle.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 전투에서 죽을 때에 그렇게 될 것이다.
